byline.contributor: Brando de Leonardis and Andrew Turner contributed reporting.

abstract: Juventus goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon, one of Italy's most popular soccer players, hopes to one day coach United States men's national soccer team.
lead_paragraph: Buffon, the goalkeeper for Juventus and Italy’s national team, plans to stay in Italy for now. Still, Buffon does have broader dreams, including running the United States national men’s team.

headline.main: One Day, Italy’s Gianluigi Buffon Wants to Call the Shots, Not Stop Them
headline.print_headline: One Day, Italian Star Wants to Call the Shots, Not Stop Them

snippet: Buffon, the goalkeeper for Juventus and Italy’s national team, plans to stay in Italy for now. Still, Buffon does have broader dreams, including running the United States national men’s team.
